Algorithms
==========

SPORCO provides algorithms for solving optimisation problems within
the following categories:


Standard Sparse Representations
-------------------------------

* :doc:`bpdn <algorithms/bpdn>` (Basis Pursuit DeNoising)
* :doc:`cmod <algorithms/cmod>` (Constrained Method of Optimal Directions)
* :doc:`bpdndl <algorithms/bpdndl>` (Basis Pursuit DeNoising Dictionary Learning)


Convolutional Sparse Representations
------------------------------------

* :doc:`cbpdn <algorithms/cbpdn>` (Convolutional Basis Pursuit DeNoising)
* :doc:`ccmod <algorithms/ccmod>` (Convolutional Constrained Method of Optimal Directions)
* :doc:`cbpdndl <algorithms/cbpdndl>` (Convolutional Basis Pursuit DeNoising Dictionary Learning)



Miscellaneous
-------------

* :doc:`tvl1 <algorithms/tvl1>` (:math:`\ell^1` Total Variation)
* :doc:`tvl2 <algorithms/tvl2>` (:math:`\ell^2` Total Variation)
* :doc:`spline <algorithms/spline>` (:math:`\ell^1` Spline)
* :doc:`rpca <algorithms/rpca>` (Robust Principal Component Analysis)
